item.title: angularday
item.description: Talks Sam Bellen - Knock knock, who's there? Authenticating your single page apps using JSON Web Tokens Ã–nder Ceylan - Level up your NgRx game Zack Chapple - Adventures in Node and Ne Stephen Fluin - What's new in 8.0 (live streamin Elena Gancheva - Elegance of Movement with Reactive Angular Animation Francesco Leardini - Offline web applications don't exist anymore!
